page.title: 12NOTTINGHAM HOME LIFE
page.content: In the{sitting room}there is a carpet, settee, television, radio, and a telephone.The family spends most of its time in this room.I watch the {television}mostly.There are four channels to choose from.I like cartoons and exciting films best.I have got a{video}which records films so that you can watch them again.It is grey with lots of buttons.When I want a change I plug in my{computer}and play games on it or write programs on it.Sometimes I play games with{cards} or{boardgames}with my family or friends.My mum loves doing{crosswords. Some people even work in their sitting room.Someone brings the{work}round in a van and collects it again a week later.They do things like packing, making dolls, Christmas crackers or clothes.
